resps: React-based Single Page Application: A sophisticated web platform built using React, leveraging the power of component-based architecture.
NFT Marketplace Functionality: Comprehensive features for displaying, managing, and interacting with NFT collections and items.
Advanced Styling System: Intricate custom CSS with multiple color schemes, gradient options, and a dark mode toggle for user preference.
Responsive Design: Carefully crafted layouts that adapt seamlessly to various screen sizes and devices.
Interactive UI Components: Rich set of user interface elements including carousels, accordions, custom buttons, and animated transitions.
External Library Integration: Thoughtful incorporation of Bootstrap and jQuery to enhance functionality and design capabilities.
Asset Management: Curated selection of images from reputable sources like Freepik, Giphy, and Pexels, properly credited.
Development Tooling: Robust set of npm scripts for efficient development, testing, and production build processes.
Performance Optimization: Strategic implementation of CSS transitions and build optimizations for a smooth user experience.
Accessibility Considerations: Core design and structure that takes into account web accessibility standards and best practices.
Next.js 14 Implementation: Utilizing the latest version of Next.js for cutting-edge React-based web development.
Prisma ORM with PostgreSQL: Robust database management using Prisma client and PostgreSQL for efficient data handling.
Kinde Authentication: Implementing secure user authentication with @kinde-oss/kinde-auth-nextjs. This system allows for secure user sign-up, login, and session management.
Supabase Integration: Leveraging Supabase for additional backend functionality, particularly for image storage.
Interactive Mapping: Incorporation of Leaflet and react-leaflet for dynamic and interactive map features.
Advanced UI Components: Usage of Radix UI components for creating a polished and accessible user interface.
Tailwind CSS Styling: Employing Tailwind CSS for efficient and responsive design implementation.
TypeScript Integration: Enhancing code quality and developer experience with TypeScript throughout the project.
Comprehensive Home Listing System: Detailed property listings with features like favorites, categories, and search functionality.
Server-Side Rendering: Leveraging Next.js's SSR capabilities for improved performance and SEO optimization.
